Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) #-5 W 6, #I-10, #rT, 7 @avri+-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 No:: 11041/21/2002-Admn. h August 2006 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (68 [2006# [Decision taken on PSQ Cell's file No. 11018/25/2006/PSQ dated 31.07.2006] Sub: Formal release of NHAI Works Manual and IQuality Assurance Manual' reg "NHAI Works Manuall has been prepared and formally released by Chairman NHAF on 3T.T0T .z2006  This Manual takes effect from 1st August 2006 and should be followed uniformly by all units of NHAI 2. The Quality Assurance Manual adopted by NHAI vide letter No. 11041/21/2002- Admhn daled ttTT-Zuus has also been printed in Book Form and released formally on 31.07.2006. This Manual is already in effect. 3 This issues with the approval of Member (A): (G P CHAND) GENERAL MANAGER (ADMN:) To AII Officer at HQ AII PIUs/CMUsISPVs to PS to Chairman PS IPA to all Members NHAL Copy
